exam_info.title: DATA SCIENCE FUNDAMENTALS - MIDTERM EXAM
instructions: Answer all questions using the datasets provided in the course materials
You may use Python, Excel, or manual calculations
Submit your answers and any code/calculations used

questions.question: What is the total revenue generated from the "Electronics" category in Q4 2024? Show your calculation.
Calculate the average order value (AOV) for customers who used the discount code "SAVE20". What percentage of total orders used this discount code?
Which product_id had the highest return rate? Calculate the return rate as: (number of returned items / number of items sold) × 100. Provide the product_id and the exact return rate percentage.
What was the revenue trend? Compare total revenue in October vs November vs December. Did revenue increase or decrease month-over-month? By what percentage?
How many customers fall into each age group? Young (18-30), Middle (31-50), Senior (51+). Provide exact counts for each segment.
Calculate the Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) for customer_id "C1042". Use the formula: CLV = (average_order_value) × (purchase_frequency) × (customer_tenure_years). Show all intermediate calculations.
What is the correlation coefficient between customer_age and total_spent? Round to 3 decimal places. What does this correlation suggest?
Calculate the conversion rate for Control Group (Group A) and Treatment Group (Group B). Which group performed better and by how much?
How many users were exposed to each variant? Was the sample size balanced between groups? (Balanced = difference less than 5% of total users)

Calculate the statistical significance using a chi-square test. Is the p-value less than 0.05? Can we conclude the treatment had a significant effect? (You may use provided chi-square tables or calculators)
